text: 17.21: Mk 13.21; Ru 17.23; Ro 14.17Mbe maaŋ muuŋgip ana ganɨv khaŋ suanga, ‘Mba tuk khar hɨgi’ o, mbe khaŋ suanga, ‘Mba tuk mbar hɨgi.’ Fhuvara. Nde mbarara. Fhe Bakɨme won gumgi gu mbigi ganɨnga tuk, ana nden hɨgap nden rɨgar khar ki.”17.21 Mbe gumgi mbari, mbe mba kameŋ domdorav khaŋ nzuai, “Nde mbarara! Fhe Bakɨme won gumgi gu mbigi ganɨrim, mbe ana piin kɨrga tɨv nden ndavir verir ki.”
